para.programlisting:
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.news.org/schemas" targetNamespace="http://www.news.org/schemas" elementFormDefault="qualified">
<!-- importing the XML namespace makes xml:id an ID attribute under lax validation --> <xs:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace"/> <xs:element name="employee"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="position" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="name" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="station" type="stationType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:integer"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element>
<xs:complexType name="stationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="city" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:element name="month"> </xs:element>
</xs:schema>
